issue.subject: improve the base layer management
issue.description: In the V1, the base layer management is very complicated. There is two level of management. It would be nice to improve this management to get it more simple.

journals.notes:
I was wondering : should we have a generic base layer management in the CORE, then defined baselayers will be available for all modules (MAP, SHOP, etc...)

We noticed that it is a transversal need so we may put it in the CORE... but there are maybe some modules' specificity ?
